overview:
Dwayne Sye has guided Cvent’s cost-effective yet innovative use of technology since the company’s founding. Dwayne helped design and oversee the development of Cvent’s original product as well as its subsequent upgrades and redesigns. Today, he is responsible for Cvent’s worldwide technology infrastructure and operations.

Dwayne brings broad technology experience and expertise in decision-support software and technology to Cvent. He previously worked at MicroStrategy, the leading worldwide provider of Intelligent E-Business software. At MicroStrategy, Dwayne provided consulting services to clients evaluating the company’s next generation software products. Prior to MicroStrategy, Dwayne was the Founder and President of Secant Communications, a systems consulting company and a Senior Consultant for Ernst & Young, where he focused on developing sophisticated decision-support solutions for mid-market clients.
